name: G.I. Joe: Battleground
storyline:
Will you shout YO JOE! and take command of the heroic forces of G.I.JOE to fight for freedom?
Or will your battle cry be COBRA! as you lead the forces of Cobra to strike terror to all who oppose?

G.I. JOE: BATTLEGROUND is an all-out fight to assemble and train the most powerful squads of iconic G.I.JOE and Cobra characters! Choose your side and build teams of elite soldiers and skilled agents to take on dangerous missions around the globe.
summary: A fighting game with no fight graphics and allows to create squads and level up characters.
